Sanctuary:DokiDokiMemoir.NAME: Memoir of the Literature Club
Sanctuary:DokiDokiMemoir.FLAVOR: Thank you for being a part of the Literature Club!.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an additional [E] NL The connection between worlds makes the Spire distort every 3 turns. NL Distortions can help or hinder you.

Sanctuary:TheSun.NAME: The Sun
Sanctuary:TheSun.FLAVOR: A small orb, powering the colossal, ever-beating heart of the world.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right Click: Destroy this relic and Stun a random enemy.

Sanctuary:Amadeus.NAME: Amadeus System
DESCRIPTIONS: Our records don't have anything on this relic!

Sanctuary:MetalUpa.NAME: Metal Upa
Sanctuary:MetalUpa.FLAVOR: The name "Mayushii!" is written on the bottom.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b3 Metallicize.

Sanctuary:?.NAME: Heavy Burden
Sanctuary:?.FLAVOR: Tell me God, are you punishing me? Is this the price I'm paying for my past mistakes?
DESCRIPTIONS: Our records don't have anything on this relic!

Sanctuary:TheSwarm.NAME: The Swarm
Sanctuary:TheSwarm.FLAVOR: What it was before it is no more. Neither Beast nor God, it is a creation unlike all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an additional [E] . Enemies become Swarmed

Sanctuary:EchoStone.NAME: Echo Stone
Sanctuary:EchoStone.FLAVOR: A smooth, white stone recovered in the Sanctuary.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right clicking this relic, you hear a voice within your mind.

Sanctuary:TimewalkingPendant.NAME: Timewalking Pendant
Sanctuary:TimewalkingPendant.FLAVOR: Anachronic Eternity in the palm of your hand.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 32 Cards you play, Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn.

Sanctuary:OrderPad.NAME: Order Pad
DESCRIPTIONS: Right Click to buy a random uncommon rarity relic for 150 gold.

Sanctuary:RainbowDark.NAME: Rainbow in the Dark
Sanctuary:RainbowDark.FLAVOR: You've been left on your own, like a rainbow in the dark.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel 1 Frost, 1 Lightning and 1 Dark

Sanctuary:TwinFlower.NAME: Happy Flowers
Sanctuary:TwinFlower.FLAVOR: Happiness is best shared with others.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rHappy #rFlower[#FFFFFF]. NL RESETS YOUR COUNTER. NL Every 3 turns, gain [E] [E]

Sanctuary:Adamantium.NAME: Adamantium
Sanctuary:Adamantium.FLAVOR: A pink tinted metal from a two dimensional world. Seems indestructable.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rOrichalcum[#FFFFFF]. If you end your turn without Block, gain #b9 Block.

Sanctuary:LunarClock.NAME: Lunar Clock
Sanctuary:LunarClock.FLAVOR: A small pocket watch originally belonging to a maiden. Holding it makes time distort around you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Upon Pickup, set your run timer to -2:00. Dealing damage rewinds time by #rhalf the damage dealt. Taking damage fast-fowards the timer by #rTriple the amount taken. When the timer reaches #b0, you lose.

Sanctuary:HakureiShrine.NAME: Hakurei Shrine
Sanctuary:HakureiShrine.FLAVOR: There's a large donation box for visitors to leave money in, but since visitors are scarce, it's usually empty.
DESCRIPTIONS: Our records don't have anything on this relic!

Sanctuary:DoubleEdgedShield.NAME: Legendary Shield
Sanctuary:DoubleEdgedShield.FLAVOR: I'll defend this world on my own!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would receive more than 7 unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 7. NL Whenever you would receive less than 7 unblocked attack damage, increase it to 7.

Sanctuary:MenacingAura.NAME: Menacing Aura
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every combat, gain #b5 #yStrength[#FFFFFF]. All Enemies gain #b3 #yStrength and Gain #b5% #rMax #rHP
